argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_retopbas | |- ran (,) e. TopBases |
| 2 |  | #P_bastg | |- ( ran (,) e. TopBases -> ran (,) C_ ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- ran (,) C_ ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_retop | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top |
| 5 |  | #P_sssigagen | |- ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top -> ( topGen ` ran (,) ) C_ ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) C_ ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_sstri | |- ran (,) C_ ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-brsiga | |- BrSiga = ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sseqtr4i | |- ran (,) C_ BrSiga |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- vol = vol |
| 11 |  | #P_dmvlsiga | |- dom vol e. ( sigAlgebra ` RR ) |
| 12 |  | #P_elrnsiga | |- ( dom vol e. ( sigAlgebra ` RR ) -> dom vol e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mp1i | |- ( vol = vol -> dom vol e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 14 |  | #P_brsigarn | |- BrSiga e. ( sigAlgebra ` RR ) |
| 15 |  | #P_elrnsiga | |- ( BrSiga e. ( sigAlgebra ` RR ) -> BrSiga e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mp1i | |- ( vol = vol -> BrSiga e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_ismbfm | |- ( vol = vol -> ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) <-> ( F e. ( U. BrSiga ^m U. dom vol ) /\ A. x e. BrSiga ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 17 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) <-> ( F e. ( U. BrSiga ^m U. dom vol ) /\ A. x e. BrSiga ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) -> A. x e. BrSiga ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) |
| 20 |  | #P_ssralv | |- ( ran (,) C_ BrSiga -> ( A. x e. BrSiga ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol -> A. x e. ran (,) ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) ) |
| 21 | 9, 19, 20 | #P_mpsyl | |- ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) -> A. x e. ran (,) ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) |
| 22 | 18 | #P_simplbi | |- ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) -> F e. ( U. BrSiga ^m U. dom vol ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( F e. ( RR ^m RR ) -> F : RR --> RR ) |
| 24 |  | #P_unibrsiga | |- U. BrSiga = RR |
| 25 |  | #P_unidmvol | |- U. dom vol = RR |
| 26 | 24, 25 | #P_oveq12i | |- ( U. BrSiga ^m U. dom vol ) = ( RR ^m RR ) |
| 27 | 23, 26 | #P_eleq2s | |- ( F e. ( U. BrSiga ^m U. dom vol ) -> F : RR --> RR ) |
| 28 |  | #P_ismbf | |- ( F : RR --> RR -> ( F e. MblFn <-> A. x e. ran (,) ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) ) |
| 29 | 22, 27, 28 | #P_3syl | |- ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) -> ( F e. MblFn <-> A. x e. ran (,) ( `' F " x ) e. dom vol ) ) |
| 30 | 21, 29 | #P_mpbird | |- ( F e. ( dom vol MblFnM BrSiga ) -> F e. MblFn ) |
